meanings.sent1: I accidentally overdry my clothes in the dryer.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overdry her hair with the blow dryer.
meanings.sent3: The sun seemed to overdry the grass, making it crunchy.
meanings.sent4: The desert heat can quickly overdry your skin.
meanings.sent5: Be careful not to overdry the paint on the canvas.

meanings.sent1: The overdry sponge was hard and unusable.
meanings.sent2: The overdry bread crumbled at the slightest touch.
meanings.sent3: The overdry leaves crackled underfoot as we walked.
meanings.sent4: Her overdry lips needed some moisturizing balm.
meanings.sent5: The overdry soil cracked in the heat of the sun.

meanings.sent1: Please overdry the wet laundry before folding it.
meanings.sent2: He had to overdry the dishes to put them away quickly.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to overdry the vegetables before cooking them.
meanings.sent4: The instructions said to overdry the surface before applying the paint.
meanings.sent5: The technician will overdry the circuit board to ensure no moisture remains.
